requirement.description: The SR2ML plug-in shall allow support for user-defined instructions for controlling the execution stages of the probabilistic safety, risk and reliability analysis.
The SR2ML plug-in shall allow for user-defined output types for simulation data.
The SR2ML plug-in shall support the computation of risk probability.
The SR2ML plug-in shall be able to be executed in parallel via RAVEN
The SR2ML plug-in shall be able to be initialized via input files.
